title: LG Styler - Steam Clothing Care System | LG USA
description:
LG Styler Steam Clothing Care System

Features:

Gentle Dry
The low-temperature drying system absorbs moisture for a gentle dry which minimizes wear and tear on your clothing.

Fabric Care
The LG Styler gently dries clothing and non-clothing items that require a lower drying temperature or can’t be tumbled dry*

Gentle Dry
Gentle Dry is ideal for fabrics that require gentle, waterless treatment.

Sanitary
Using the sanitary cycle powered by TrueSteamTM, the LG Styler helps to reduce allergens.

Reduce Allergens on Various Items
Over 99% sanitization and reduction of allergens and bacteria with TrueSteam™.

Sanitary
Use the Sanitary cycle to help reduce allergens on children’s clothing and stuffed toys, bedding and other fabrics.

Pants Crease Care

Easy Wrinkle Care Fabric Care for Pants 
Hang dress pants flat in the Styler’s Pants Crease Care. It will crease the pant legs and reduce wrinkles elsewhere.

Pants Crease Care 
The pants crease care keeps pants legs creased while reducing wrinkles elsewhere. The pants crease care can be used for all different types of dress pants and trousers.

Refresh 
With just the touch of a button, take special care of your favorite suits, coats, and sweaters which may be difficult to clean everyday.

Odor & Wrinkle Care for Clothes 
With its TrueSteamTM Technology and Moving Hanger System, the LG Styler will help to keep clothes smelling fresh

Refresh
Refresh and reduce wrinkles from outfits to start your day looking sharp. 

Specifications:

Colors Available: Espresso, White

Capacity:
11.5 lb (5.2 kg)
3 Items + 1 (Pants)

Features:
Touch Control Hidden Display
TrueSteamTM
Heat-pump System (Inverter)
Sound On/Off
NFC Course Download (Android Mobile OS)
Certificates and Awards:
2015 Red Dot Design Award
2015 iF Product Design Award
Certified Sanitary by British Allergy Foundation
Detected Sanitary by Intertek

Styler Components

Moving Hanger: LG’s exclusive TrueSteamTM sprays soft steam onto clothing while the moving hanger works to smooth wrinkles.

Pants Crease Care: The Pants Crease Care keeps pants creased while reducing wrinkles elsewhere.

Aroma Kit: Insert an aroma sheet to gently infuse your clothes with scent

Versatile Rack: The convenient rack can be used to style clothes and accessories that can’t be hung up.

Portable Water Container: The portable containers make filling and draining the water for True Steam™ easy.

Approximate Dimensions:

Height: 72-3/4"
Width: 17-1/2"
Length: 23"

Approximate Weight:

Shipping: 183 lbs
